website_summaries.verdict: A very accurate and durable scale that provides a good value for the price.
pros: Plugs in with an AC adapter
cons: The display is not detachable from the scale and may be hard to read if you are weighing larger packages

customer_reviews.title: It works....
customer_reviews.text: When you weigh something it beeps letting you know it’s done weighing. However, for real time weighing it won’t do it. So for instance if you were weighing meat, you cannot keep adding slices to achieve a desired amount. Each time you weigh something you have to take it off the scale then put it back on.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: This Scale is an Outstanding Value!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for weighing my display cabinets before giving a shipping quote. It is so easy to use, right out of the box and it is extremely accurate. Some of my cabinets weigh over 50 lbs and this works very well with them also even though they are quite large. This purchase was surely one of the best values I've had here on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Craig T Parker

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding scale with great improvements over previous models.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent scale and stylish all at the same time. At first I wasn't sure if this was an official Weighmax scale since it wasn't on their website at the time, so I contacted them. They reassured me it is manufactured by them but it is the newest model which has not been updated on their website so I ordered from Amazon. After checking 30 packages against the postal scale at the post office I can confirm this scale is accurate. It has all the features many complained not having in previous versions and I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: babysmama

customer_reviews.title: I love this scale
customer_reviews.text: I love this scale. It's very easy to use when shipping books, clothes etc that are sold online. I love the hold function which allows me to weigh an item, remove it off the scale, and still be able to see the final weight. This scale has made online sales and shipping transactions easier. I no longer have to go to the post office to weigh and then ship packages. I can do it all from home and just print the postage stamps.
customer_reviews.author: Baja Mama

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate after a few months
customer_reviews.text: It worked fine for 4 months and now all of a sudden it thinks 8ox packages weigh 2 pounds, and 11oz package weighs 4 lbs. I have tried "Tare" to set it to zero but it will say zero, empty, and then you put a light package on there and it goes up to 4 lbs. So it's completely useless all of a sudden :( My last scale lasted around 5 years until I actually broke it by dropping it so I hope for this kind of stuff to last more than 4 months.
customer_reviews.author: Bayne

customer_reviews.title: Small, practical and cost effective.
customer_reviews.text: The better of the available options. It's smaller than some of the units and cheaper. It's covered with a metal plate on the weighing surface. It can be run on batteries for a very long time and it can be plugged into the outlet. - It's small and appears sturdy. - Readout is clear - Lots of options for weight readout - Perfect for mailing small and medium items - Display is light on dark, so it's easy to see in the dark
customer_reviews.author: E!

customer_reviews.title: Very Accurate and Easy To Use Postage Scale
customer_reviews.text: After extensive pre-purchase review, including some negative feedback on the scale’s accuracy, I have been fully satisfied with the performance especially accuracy. All weighed items have been spot on with US Postal Service weights. It should be noted I have not yet weighed anything over 12 pounds and have only used for less than one week, but it certainly it is far more accurate (to 1/10 of an ounce) than the bathroom scale I was using.
customer_reviews.author: Darrel G. Moreland

customer_reviews.title: Excellent postal scale
customer_reviews.text: Just got this, it is an excellent scale, very accurate. Feels sturdy and well made and the display is crisp and easy to read. Recommended
customer_reviews.author: Scottso

customer_reviews.title: Battery power does not work
customer_reviews.text: Battery power does not work: it's necessary to plug it in. I tried three different sets of batteries, including batteries which work in other devices. I just plug the scale in. Easier than a return. Also, the cord is very short. For most purposes, expect to use an extension cord. Other than those two points it seems to work as it should. If the battery power worked, I would recommend it as good value for money.
customer_reviews.author: abcd9876

customer_reviews.title: Game changer!
customer_reviews.text: Oh man, this thing is a game changer. I've had a small cheap not-digital scale but it only goes up to 16 oz. otherwise, I get on a regular scale once with the box, once without, then subtract lol ...don't judge. I use this to scale to weigh the apparel and accessories for my brand, Derivative Apparel, also available on Amazon :) If you sell on FBA, this is a 'must have' item. Arrived fast, easy to use, an works great! Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Sena

customer_reviews.title: Good for postage, food, and large weight items.
customer_reviews.text: Not dead nuts on at lower weights, but okay for postage. Items up to 200+ grams weighed here and checked on a real gram scale don't match. Minor amounts don't matter above that. Don't try to use rechargeable batteries. It gives a constant low battery warning.
customer_reviews.author: Seth R.

customer_reviews.title: Hold function is properly designed! Thank you
customer_reviews.text: Hold function is properly designed! Thank you. Scale beeps when steady weight reading is achieved and holds the reading, for you to view. Allowing you to remove the oversize box that is blocking the view of said reading. Make sure this is how your scale's hold function works for best experience. (or something like this) -- Avoid any scale that has a side hold button that is pressed after the steady weight is reading is achieved ex: ACCUTECK W-8250 (bad design).
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Even Last 3 Months
customer_reviews.text: This is the third postal scale I've purchased over the last 10 or so years, and by far the worst investment of all three. On only one occasion I turned it on when it wasn't perfectly level, and it's now trash. I've gone through troubleshooting to try to reset it with the seller to no avail. Don't waste your $20+!
customer_reviews.author: Non-Toxic Home

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent, inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what everyone is raving about. This scale is super inaccurate and inconsistent. I suppose it might work for packages that don’t need to be too exact but I tried to use it for cooking and it gave a different reading every time I reweighed my ingredients
customer_reviews.author: Tim Feliciano

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: Works really well. Sometimes the weight total changes but maybe by .01 oz. Stores away pretty good. Small and compact. Overall I’d give it a thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The weight does not match the post office weight when mailing stuff
customer_reviews.author: Lockwood

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for fostering kittens!
customer_reviews.text: I foster bottle baby kittens year-round and needed a reliable scale so I could weigh the kittens. This performs great and has multiple ways for me to weigh them, as well as a tare function and easily wiped down surface. Still going strong after a year+! I recommend this scale to all fellow fosters. The only downside is the On/Off button is starting to lose it's lettering. But not a big deal since the scale still performs perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Summer Gage

customer_reviews.title: Was good at first ....
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this scale for just over a year. I use it approximately 5 days per week. At first it worked great. I would notice a .2-.3 oz variance between the this scale and the post office. No problem. Recently that deviation has increased to 8-11 OUNCES!! I replaced the batteries and brought it to the post office to calibrate using their 5# weight. Calibrated no problem. Then we compared a roll of labels between the scales. Post office scale: 14.03. Newly calibrated weighmax 13.22. Put the calibration weight back on — 5# exactly. Makes no sense. I am now looking to buy a new scale that is more reliable and consistent.
customer_reviews.author: PLB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: Returning to Ebay selling my former treasures, now someone else's, this small scale weighs up to 55 lbs and is far less expensive than the cheapest one on the shelf at the big box office supply store (and it only weighed up to 25.) Since 55 lbs is the airline luggage cutoff, this may come in handy in more ways than I expected. Have not put batteries in it. Charged it with the USB/wall plug for very short time and started using it immediately. Very simple. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: schapa7800

customer_reviews.title: Weight Fluctuates Depending on Placement of Package
customer_reviews.text: There were so many good reviews on this scale that I decided to take a chance and order it because it's such a good price. The biggest problem I have with it is that the weight fluctuates. I can weigh the same package 4 times and get 4 different weights. The weight varies by ounces which doesn't really matter when shipping UPS. It does matter when I ship with USPS though. So, I've been weighing packages several times, and I go with the highest weight so I don't put to little postage on packages. It also depends on how you place the package on the scale as to what weight you get. So, this scale isn't 100% accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Dawny Bear

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: I resell books and DVD's as a side-line, and running to the P.O. to weigh and ship my items is a major pain. I used an analog spring scale for a year or so, but concluded it was just not accurate enough for the small items I sell. This Weighmax scale is amazingly accurate despite it's very reasonable price, down to the tenth of an ounce, and has allowed me to pack, weigh and ship from home with ease. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great for raw pet food portioning
customer_reviews.text: This works pretty well. I use it on the 0.00 lb setting and sometimes it can't decide the weight by +/- .02 lb and it kind of drives me crazy, BUT, for the price and the fact that I use it three times every day, it's great. Definitely good for portioning pet food, which is what I use it for. UPDATE 12/2018 - still working as advertised, HOWEVER, I often have wet fingers when I press the buttons on the scale, and the text has worn/washed off far too easily. It's nothing to return it over, but be advised that the text comes off the buttons if that matters to you.
customer_reviews.author: Soshan

customer_reviews.title: Best scale I’ve ever purchased!
customer_reviews.text: I’m very impressed by this scale. I’ve had several scales before, multiple purchases from amazon and a lot of them have been cheap, flimsy scales. This one is awesome. Very solid, heavy duty product. Comes with an optional power cord but also runs off 2 “AAA” batteries which is great because a lot of scales I’ve purchased before use those hard to find flat/cell batteries. The batteries that came with the scale seem super cheap and will need to be replaced probably fairly quick but I’m very impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Nice display, seems accurate
customer_reviews.text: The one feature that made me select this one over all others was that all buttons are large and on the front panel, so you don't have to crane your neck from one side to the other if need to change units or set tare. The first one I received was defective, but the second seems to be working perfectly. I like the large numbers and good backlighting on the display. I owned another WeighMax scale that lasted me 7 years and since they have a 10-year warranty, they promptly replaced it, so I'm very impressed by how they stand behind their product. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Kam G.

customer_reviews.title: INCONSISTENT READING!
customer_reviews.text: I loved it at first because it was so easy to read and able to switch to different unit measurements. But now just 8 months into this and used probably less than 20 times, the accuracy turned to the worst! It would give me 5 to 6 different readings of the weights. It’s so frustrating when you’re trying to get a correct weight and it keeps changing!
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Had the unit for little over 6 months and used it infrequently. The back light is not coming on any longer which makes it difficult to see the digits. It was sitting on my desk all this time so no drops or anything. Perhaps a loose connection? Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Simpleton

customer_reviews.title: Okay but minor annoyances exist
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice feeling scale. However it makes this annoying beep sounds which is unnecessary and makes it hard to use in a quiet office environment. Also it shows weight in lb/oz instead of just lbs. so it says 6 lbs 6.6 oz instead of 6.4 lbs. battery function works great so you don’t need to leave it plugged in!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect scale for my everyday tasks
customer_reviews.text: After 3 months of fairly heavy use, I can safely say this is an excellent and accurate scale. I was surprised at the scale's "heft" when it arrived, but it definitely feels sturdy, especially compared to my previous kitchen scale I was using. One feature that I really find useful is the "Hold" feature to get weights of large boxes when I make labels for couriers. Overall very reliable and love the fact it has a lighted display screen as well.
customer_reviews.author: EddieTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: This product is good Value for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I really like that its got a plug and batteries for option to use with or with out. I like the price and it works just like you would expect. Its not to heavy too so that is nice if you need to lug it around. It also really works good for oz which is what I needed. Down side is that you can't always see the numbers if you are weighing a large box. I can't say really anything to bad its good for small stuff and can do big stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica L. Popovics

customer_reviews.title: Great Scale So Far
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this for a couple of months. I purchased it when my 15 year old digital scale became grossly erratic and inaccurate. So far, so good. I have compared the measurements of this scale to the one in the lobby at our post office. Of the 5 packages I've sent since purchasing, ranging from 8 oz. to 25.4 lbs., its been completely accurate, and in sync with the USPS Scale.
customer_reviews.author: ROY E ELLIOTT

customer_reviews.title: Look good but don't work
customer_reviews.text: a 14 oz package weighed 2.45 lbs on the scale. I've tried to get information about an instruction book so I can calibrate but to no avail. I would not purchase again because they do not serve the purpose for which I bought them. I need to be able to quote people how much postage their package will cost them. I've been having to make numerous trips to the post office to get a quote then back to the post office to buy postage once the customer says yea or nay.
customer_reviews.author: Peacock

customer_reviews.title: Small but mighty
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how well-priced this scale is and how much it can do for its size! The "hold" function has been a godsend for weighing big items simply. And the weights have been an exact match with Fedex weights for my ground shipments. I even used this to weigh my suitcase before heading to the airport. All of my former scales have gone into the donation box. I can't recommend this little gizmo enough!
customer_reviews.author: superdogmom

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Have been using kitchen scales for years, because I didn’t want to invest in a USPS scale. It’s very lightweight, easy to store away when not in use, and so far, very accurate. I would always round up my shipping weights, so there would be no issues for my customers. I got burned big time at the post office once over 1 ounce. Guess she was having a bad day, but it cost me so much money! So far, so good! If anything changes I will update my review..
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: How did I live life without this? Do you have any notion how long I have been waiting for a small scale to be able to handle big items? How many times in my life I have used my own weight on a bathroom scale, then minused it while holding an item? And how accurate is that? This is wonderful. And so small! AND BATTERY POWERED!!!! ARE YOU KIDDING ME? It even works during operation if you unplug it. Goes directly to the battery power and doesn't skip a beat. That's awesome.
customer_reviews.author: DAVISION INC.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, Accurate, Has Hold Button to keep weight showing for oversized packages
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this scale to weight packages so I can print USPS labels at home. This scale is very accurate and I have had no issues with the machine. There is a hold button which holds the weight of oversized packages where you cannot see the weight until the package is removed. It does not automatically shut off after standing idle for some time so you have to remember to turn the unit off when you are finished with your shipping for the day.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Head

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little scale!
customer_reviews.text: Works great but the only thing I had a problem with sometimes the hold button doesn’t work. Some of the boxes I need to weigh are a little larger so I need to press the hold button and remove the box to see the weight. It glitches every one in awhile but other than that it’s great! I also love the fact that something this small can weigh up to 90 pounds. Very good product for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Bestie85

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and intuitive to use
customer_reviews.text: I needed a desk friendly scale to weigh packages for our business. I was worried about this purchase because it was low cost but I can confirm it works great and is accurate. It's easy to adjust the unit of measurement and the display is easy to read. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: PS03

customer_reviews.title: Nice scale!
customer_reviews.text: I have been suffering along with an old digital scale that has seen better days. It works most of the time, but accuracy is off. I needed a new scale that could measure down to a few grams and up to around 50kg. This scale fit the bill. I've been using it pretty regularly now and I'm pleased that it is working well and it's size. I have one complaint: It uses AAA batteries instead of AA. It's not for no space inside the shell. I use probably 6 AAA batteries a year and 30-50 AA so they are always on hand.
customer_reviews.author: ElectricGod

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Scale for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I am very impressed by the quality of this scale, especially for the low price I paid for it. It turns on and is ready to use quickly, and can handle a wide range of sizes. Most of the things I sell are in the ounces category, and this scale is very accurate down to the ounce. It can also handle larger items, though the tray isn't big enough to handle huge items by any means. It's a great product and I would buy again! I've used it daily for months and it is great.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie J. Elsen

customer_reviews.title: Clear, easy to read display, simple to use.
customer_reviews.text: Works very well, easy to use. Comes with a power supply, so convenient to plug in. Also comes with two AAA batteries in case you want to use it where there is now power outlet. Only downside is that it is very hard to see the weight display when weighing a large box. But the scale does have a tare option, and so I just used a small box on top of the scale, set the tare to zero, and placed the larger box on top of the small box which allows me to see the display.
customer_reviews.author: Edward S.

customer_reviews.title: Differing information
customer_reviews.text: Shame on me for not looking deeper into the information. I typically go to the technical information part of the description and on this product is shows the size as much larger than it actually is. After receiving the product I went back to the part to check. It is described correctly in the "marketing" portion of the website. I don't think I can use it at this size. Please try to make the information match to avoid headaches. Overall I like the unit, it just isn't big enough physically for the parts we are weighing.
customer_reviews.author: jay kuhn

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality & accurate scale!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very easy to read and easy to use scale. I like the idea that heavier things and be placed on here. I have a postal scale that only goes up to maybe 9 or 10 lb so this going up to 90 pounds is a great addition to my appliances. I am very very happy that I chose this particular scale. It's good quality and accurate. I compared weights to my other scales with this one and they all registered exactly the same. It's a quality scale and for the price you cannot beat it. I highly recommend purchasing this scale.
customer_reviews.author: Ms McGee

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and accurate
customer_reviews.text: Needed a scale to do occasional selling on Ebay and didn't want to spend too much on a scale and decided on this one. I don't regret it one bit. It read accurately each time I tested it with the same item, it was easy to read and there's a function to lock the read out number when you have a larger package if it overs the screen. Over all i am extremely satisfied with it and would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Wing Tang

customer_reviews.title: Great scale and good price. Quick sip.
customer_reviews.text: Love the scale, great price too. Quick ship from seller. The only thing is it is damaged on one corner on the pad on top left corner. The box was not damaged at all so I am guessing it was this way from manufacturer. It does NOT affect use but it is cosmetically damaged, a pretty good dent in the metal. I sent a picture, the dent is by my thumb nail in left hand upper corner.
customer_reviews.author: Trina L.

customer_reviews.title: This scale is great very easy to use right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of going to the post office to mail items sold on ebay. This scale is great very easy to use right out of the box. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Papawalt

customer_reviews.title: Quality Assurance Fail
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box I was met with disappointment because the top plate on the scale was crooked. (see pic for details). I could live with a cosmetic defect but double disappointment when the scale gave me two different readings for the same package. A package turned upright somehow gained 5oz & several additional tests also showed discrepancies. Two stars because I like the available functions (Tare, Hold, etc) and they seemed to work appropriately.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Bobberson

customer_reviews.title: No good instructions as to how to reset - other than ...
customer_reviews.text: Weight is consistently off. No good instructions as to how to reset - other than it's supposed to reset to factory every time its turned on/off.
customer_reviews.author: Lessandra Lee

customer_reviews.title: Automatically shuts off in 2 mins.
customer_reviews.text: This scale would be perfectly adequate for mail I'm sure. I bought it to weigh small concrete batchs and the accuracy was +/- .1 of an oz. which is pretty good but not quite good enough for what I was doing. I was also a little annoyed there isn't a way to turn off the auto shutdown feature and there is no way to save a tare weight that can be recalled after the dang thing shuts off automatically...
customer_reviews.author: A. Nichols

customer_reviews.title: 1 year later
customer_reviews.text: I use this almost every day to ship packages and ive never had to change the battery yet. i wish it would turn on as soon as i set something on it, but it is a cheap scale, great for beginners but as your business picks up with volume, you will wish you didnt have to turn it on, then wait 5 seconds every time you wanted to weight a new package because it will auto shut off on you in between packages if you wait too long
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work well for larger boxes
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews and QA and hoped it will work for larger boxes (20-25’). Yes, it actually worked, but I had to redo it 2-3-4 times. So had to lift the box a couple of times. The hild buttom beeps, looks like it worked, but it didnt, so I had to move the box and check if it worked, then put it again back and try again. Headache. But works well for smaller boxes, could be good for you if you need to carry it from one place to another. Another disappointment- You can. Ot weight yourself.....
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: Nice Unit
customer_reviews.text: Large Weighing surface ,,, with large digital #'s ... I make 25# batches of Sausage, & need the accuracy to make consistent size batches ... so the taste is the same, & the product is accurately weighed, & meat won't go bad because of improper sized batches.... I can put a 4x4 on the surface, to keep the 25# Tub of meat high enuf to be able to read the weight! ... Works like a Dam ... Very Happy with it ...
customer_reviews.author: Financial Planner

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a scale I could plug in so I got this one. I weighed a nickel and got 0g. I thought maybe it had a higher minimum but as I’d add more I’d get a weight flash then go back to zero instantly. I got it to work once and each nickel was off by about 1 gram. I tried on two other scales and they got a perfect 5g for each nickel. Also does not work with liquids as it takes several seconds for it to register the weight. When it DOES register a weight.
customer_reviews.author: Oskar

customer_reviews.title: Accurate scale, solid construction
customer_reviews.text: I've been bouncing between scales on Amazon and honestly this one is the one I'll probably stick with. I thought the screen being too close to the scale would be a problem but the scale saves the readings temporarily, so not an issue! Most of it is metal and it seems to be pretty accurate and durable, unlike some of the other plastic ones that are being sold on Amazon. Would recommend as an FBA seller myself!
customer_reviews.author: Rocky

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice digital scale for the price that I paid. I weighed 2 different weight workout dumbbells (5lb & 8lb) & scale was accurate to within 1-OZ of what stated weight on the dumbbell was. I purchased this to weigh packages for shipping out the occasional auction sale item & such. The 90-LB weight limit is more than sufficient. Hopefully it will prove to be a durable & long-lasting product.
customer_reviews.author: SDH

customer_reviews.title: Very accurate and consistent!
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect addition to my workflow. I make guitars and need to weigh all the different components (tuners, bridges, necks, body’s, etc.) in order to meet my ergonomic requirements. The Hold feature is essential as a guitar body is usually wide and this makes it very convenient to wait for the beep, lift the piece and see the weight. Accuracy was great from few oz parts to several lbs. I also had a 35 lb box with an speaker cabinet in it to ship and it was spot on with the FedEX scale.
customer_reviews.author: Chinjazz

customer_reviews.title: A very good small scale
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Weighmax W-2809 scale to use for postage calculations and to weigh food that we break into smaller chunks than in the original package. I've found it very easy to use, easy to read and the TARE function very good at eliminating the weight of a container used to keep the scale clean. I would purchase another one should the need arise.
customer_reviews.author: Ken A.

customer_reviews.title: So So
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes it seems correct but it gives me many different readings for the same item. Also, it will give me readings when there isn't anything on top of it at all. I don't know if all the good reviewers received different scales or ???? I just purchased a new one from a different company because I need accuracy.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work properly
customer_reviews.text: Try this experiment with yours. Weigh a bunch of things. First something weighing only a few ounces, then a couple of lbs, then maybe 10 lbs. Then go back to the item that's a few ounces. repeat. Wildly inconsistent readings. This scale should not show the fraction of an ounce because it's effectively meaningless. I paid $100+ for the rubbermaid food scale. It doesn't do ounces (just tenths of lb) but at least that one provides the same reading twice in a row.
customer_reviews.author: Forrest

customer_reviews.title: great scale.  i would buy it again.
customer_reviews.text: Researched a bunch of postal scales. This fit my criteria, great reviews. I've had it for about 2 months. works perfect. i would buy it again. if i needed 20 of them, I would buy all 20 of this exact model. would be nice to have a detachable screen to see for oversized products but at least does have a "hold" feature which allows me to see the weight for 30 or 40 seconds after I take item off scale.
customer_reviews.author: Jay from Baltimore

customer_reviews.title: Very durable and accurate
customer_reviews.text: We use this to weigh our rabbits (we have Netherlands and they need to weigh under 2.5 lbs). It has sat outside in the weather when we forgot it on top of a cage and is still working great. The display is still working fine and is easy to read, and it is accurate on weights. Haven’t ever had a rabbit “on the line” ( within an ounce of being disqualified) get disqualified on weight. If it ever breaks I will definitely be buying this same scale again
customer_reviews.author: Tigrissia

customer_reviews.title: Great Scale
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son for a gift He wanted a scale for shipping online purchases and saving money by not over paying by guessing how many stamps he should use I didn’t know much about these devices but the reviews were helpful I can tell you he’s been very pleased Saved money already on shipping and has recommended this scale to one of his friends who bought the same unit and loves it as well Great little unit for mailing shipping small items and the price was great as well
customer_reviews.author: sjz

customer_reviews.title: Easy to read & use!
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly as it says it will do! Easy to read, & easy to use. Handy for kitchen & postal use, but many other uses too. I can put a large cookie sheet on mine, then weigh my cat or dog. Could be used to weigh any kind of little pet from lizards to birds, ferrets, frogs, cats, & small dogs. It’s only limited by it’s small top. Looks sleek & nice w/ it’s stainless steel surface.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Accuracy is +- 0.1 oz
customer_reviews.text: I am using this as a kitchen scale rather than a postage scale so the slight accuracy issue (i.e., + - 0.l oz) is not an issue for me. The main negative for me is that is lacks a memory so that if I want to check what the weight was of something that I just weighed I can 't do it. But all in all it is adequate. The stainless steel weigh-area is nice, the digital display is large and the batteries last for a while.l
customer_reviews.author: jimpgh@aol.com

customer_reviews.title: Great If You Only Want It For An Hour As That's All You'll Get
customer_reviews.text: The product worked great for about an hour's use. Now the entire display just stays on with every possible item on it. I don't consider any product that works only for an hour to be classified as "durable". This is basically a piece of junk. Spend a little more and get a real scale that will outlast dinnertime.
customer_reviews.author: BM

customer_reviews.title: Good design and accuracy
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this to weigh packages to mail. The readings taken at the post office agree exactly with the ones I'm taking on this scale, even with some very large boxes on this small surface. I'm pleased with the accuracy as well as the design of this thing. It has nice features, such as the hold with beep -- works as it should.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy B

customer_reviews.title: Avoid extra fees
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for weighing packages. I needed to make sure I wasn't going over the weight limit for my check ins at the airport. It's pretty accurate as it was very close to what the scale at the airline counter showed. I didn't have to rearranged any of my stuff or pay a hefty fee for going over the limit. In fact, my relatives were so impressed to hear how easy it made the check in process that they went and got one for themselves as well.
customer_reviews.author: ShopperAnonymous

customer_reviews.title: Postal Scale for mailing packages.
customer_reviews.text: This scale was to replace a postage scale that I had, but the cord and reading scale got missed placed. Since this one has the scale reading on the front of the unit, it will be harder to lose a part. Very accurate and helps on the postage required for packages to be mailed. HIGHLY recommended for weight and accuracy.
customer_reviews.author: Red Devil

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little scale, even for very small weights amazingly accurate
customer_reviews.text: Well-crafted, I use this mostly for mail, it shows weights down to fractions of an ounce. Lightweight, easy to take where I need to use it, runs on batteries or on the continuous power supply (provided). Very happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Must have Scale!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect scale for any small business owners or reseller. I send a lot of packages out and this scale does a great job of giving me the perfect weight. I would suggest finding a stable place for it and not moving it around to much. I love it. Saves me time and money from having to go to the post office every time I need to have my packages weighed.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan M.

customer_reviews.title: The nice digital BRIGHT numbers.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best Durable Stainless Steel Digital Postal Scale on the market today. The nice digital BRIGHT numbers help me see and changing from kg to oz. so quickly. The price was unbeatable. Thank you so much for this amazing Scale.
customer_reviews.author: AVP4591

customer_reviews.title: Works fine and is accurate.
customer_reviews.text: Initially, I rated this product much lower. I thought it was broken because I could not hear the beep that tells the operator it has recorded and held a weight. And, I realized that I was too impatient in waiting for the weight to lock in. The beep should be louder. Beside that, I'm satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: RetroDude

customer_reviews.title: great scale and very accurate
customer_reviews.text: great scale and very accurate, I had a weighmax scale for about 5 years and it finally started to go and it was just a plastic model. I use the ac adapter only, have never tried it with just batteries but I am sure it will work just fine. It is also a good size for most packages. Bigger, bulky packages are sometimes an issue with seeing the screen but if you can hit the hold button you can take the package off and still see the weight. Great Scale for a Great Price
customer_reviews.author: Jesse R

customer_reviews.title: Good usps, ups, fedex, and air filling scale
customer_reviews.text: I put a glass candle holder on this and use it to fill my co2 tanks. The scale does not time out when plugged in allowing for optimal fills. By putting something on top of the scale and using the tare key, you can weigh very large boxes for shipping.
customer_reviews.author: VitaTTop Contributor: Sunglasses

customer_reviews.title: Solid, precise and practical - good shipping scale
customer_reviews.text: Wow this is a great scale and at less than $25, I think a really good deal. Using it for shipping. You can press the hold key and even if a box is big and covering the readout, it will beep to let you know weighing is done and keep result on display so you can read it after the box is removed.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Nielson

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and very accurate. Glad I purchased the scale, now I do not have to stop at the Post Office to ensure I have enough postage on the letter or card.
customer_reviews.author: Dee V

customer_reviews.title: Saves me money on shipping
customer_reviews.text: Needed a reasonable scale to weight packages for shipment, this is a nice scale with plenty of weight capacity. Small and compact considering the capacity. Looked at the remote head type of scales and decided I like the all in one design better. Large boxes do cover the scale display, that’s when I use the hold button. Place the box in the scale and push the hold button take the box off and read the scale display... no need for a remote display.
customer_reviews.author: Glen E ThomasTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Great little scale
customer_reviews.text: Great little scale, I love that it can be plugged in or not and it’s super portable. I ship little and very big packages and it handles both with ease. As long as the box or item will sit in its limited surface size it will accurately weigh it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Musto

customer_reviews.title: Best investment
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for a few years now. Hundreds of packages shipped and always accurate. Never had to use the power cord, batteries have lasted this long so far. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Model Citizen

customer_reviews.title: Not very accurate at low weights
customer_reviews.text: I got this because of the AC adapter, I was chewing through batteries on my old scale. I use it to weigh very small things (0-10oz) and at these low weights it is often inaccurate. As in I can put on the same thing 3 times and get 3 different readings. Also it beeps every time you turn it on, do a reading, press a button, and turn it off. Kind of annoying and I can't find any way to disable it. I imagine it does much better at higher weights.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: Really good scale for the money. I just wish I had gotten one with a larger base and a detachable screen. It can be a bit hard to read the screen with very large boxes. Overall this is a very very good scale for a starter ebay store or amazon business. I would recommend anyone who is starting out their online business grab this scale. Like don't wait, get it now. You will make your money back after a few shipments by saving money on shipping costs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great scales
customer_reviews.text: Started selling a bunch of stuff on eBay and found that the kitchen scales were too feeble, and the human scales were too inaccurate. These do the job perfectly and the hold function is great for big boxes. Does exactly what I wanted so 5 stars here; no complaints so far.
customer_reviews.author: James-04595

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: This is the only scale of this kind I’ve purchased, so I can’t give any comparisons - but for the few items I have to weigh, it’s been great. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy A.

customer_reviews.title: Bought twice BOTH stopped working after just a few months
customer_reviews.text: I bought one, worked great, then showed an error "UNST" after just a few months. Customer service replaced it no questions asked (which was great). Used the replacement for a few months, and now it's broken again. Customer service is not responding.
customer_reviews.author: Ted Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Id buu tbia again
customer_reviews.text: I needed a scale for gardening products and this scale weighs quite a bit of product. Its sleek and finished in poloshed stainless steel. Id buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Cristina Montejo

customer_reviews.title: Great scale
customer_reviews.text: This scale performs perfectly. Battery life is exceptional so far and I’ve only plugged it in a few times. I use it for shipping UPS and it works as it should ( heaviest so far has been 40 lbs) At this price I truly regret not having bought a dedicated scale sooner ( had been using a bathroom scale)
customer_reviews.author: LekceUS

customer_reviews.title: Has already paid for itself
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because ive been selling more and more online items and i would always just use flate rate shipping. This scale has worked great and already paid for itself by the shipping savings i've been able to get. simple to use. Hold function is nice. Sturdy construction. Very accurate when compared with USPS scales.
customer_reviews.author: benjamin cooley

customer_reviews.title: No data connection
customer_reviews.text: Everyone should be aware that this scale, despite mentioning a USB connection in the description, does not provide any link to a computer or transfer data in any way - the USB connection is for charging only - rendering this pretty useless for the typical integration with Endicia, Stamps, etc.. It is a pity, since otherwise it looks like a decent scale.
customer_reviews.author: David B. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for the money
customer_reviews.text: it would be better if it had a remote display, but for only $22 this cant be beat! It paid for itself in one day of shipping 17 boxes that weight almost 950# together
customer_reviews.author: Mark G.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little kitchen scale!
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect replacement for my previous kitchen scale. I had a scale previously that was wonderfully accurate but ran on those silly, overpriced coin cell batteries. This works just as well for me, has a much higher maximum weight and is able to be plugged in. It uses a USB plugin, but came with an adaptor. It is accurate enough for cooking and is extremely easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and Versatile
customer_reviews.text: I use this scale a lot and it's great! It comes with a power cord but I just use 2 AAA alkaline batteries and they last a long time. It's accurate from small mailers to large items up to 90 pounds. The LED screen is easy to read and can display in ounces, pounds, grams and kgs. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Bullwinkle

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice but inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: This scale looks nice and has big numbers however accuracy its not there. I weigher a small package and got 3 different reading all 3 different times. I have done it all in the same place without moving the scale and reseting it to 0 every time. Its nice looking but frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Josue C.

customer_reviews.title: I like this scale!
customer_reviews.text: Been using it for over a week for shipping items sold on eBay and its been working great. I can't comment on its accuracy but so far the post office hasn't complained. Its easy to use. Push the power button, wait a sec, put your item on the scale. Easy to read the output.
customer_reviews.author: BigBill

customer_reviews.title: Great for backpacking prep
customer_reviews.text: I really like this little scale. I used it to weigh everything I was taking backpacking. It was really easy to adjust for bigger items. I just threw a laundry basket on the scale, zeroed it out empty, and weighed all my bigger items. I’m adding an update just to say this works great still a few months later and it’s worked well for measuring small things like dog food portions.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.text: This scale seems to work well. It stays on after satbilizing, which is a nice feature for what I'm using it for. It seems to be within a few ounces, based on staying with a few ounces of zero when weight is removed after being on the scale for about an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Pontiac

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Sturdy Scale for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this scale for my online sales, it matches the postal scales every time, accurately and is very reliable, and Sturdy construction, i have no doubt ill be using this one for years to come!
customer_reviews.author: PencilArt

customer_reviews.title: Not compatible with Stamps.com
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice scale but it is not compatible with Stamps.com which we purchased it for. So we have to manually enter all weights which is a huge inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: Vallarta Girl

customer_reviews.title: It lasted for about 24 hours and died.
customer_reviews.text: Failed to power up after about day so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert F Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great scale for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Great scale for a great price. I use this weigh my kegs when I'm kegging beer. Easily and accurately handles 50 lbs of weight. Only complaint is that is shipped with dead batteries, Two AAAs. Big deal.
customer_reviews.author: J. A. Holden

customer_reviews.title: great scale, easy to use, strong
customer_reviews.text: Good features. The HOLD function is especially useful for large packages when you can't see the reading on the screen because it is covered by my package.
customer_reviews.author: CJWA 805

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be a nice quality scale
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a nice quality scale. I like that it has a battery or plug in option for power. If an item is so large that it blocks the display to see the weight you can press the hold button and remove the item and will keep the weight on the display for a bit to see. Overall i'm happy with it. I use it to weigh crystals and packages.
customer_reviews.author: Air and Fire

product_meta.title: Weighmax W-2809 90 LB X 0.1 OZ Durable Stainless Steel Digital Postal Scale, Shipping Scale With AC adapter
product_meta.description: New weighmax 2809-90BLK shipping postal scale is improved with a solid structure, enhanced capacity and higher accuracy. It is a perfect choice for using at home, office or any other place. What's included: Scale, USB cable, Batteries, Ac adapter, Instruction Manual, Warranty Card. Buy a weighmax scale, enjoy a first class service.
feature_bullets: Solid structure - Weighmax New postal scale is Improved with a more solid structure built by newest technology. With built-in stainless platform, this new postal scale is much more durable and easy to maintain.

Enhanced capacity with higher precision- This new postal scale weighs up to 90 lbs in 0.1 oz graduation. It can meet all your needs from a first-class package to parcel packages. Min Start weight: 10g.

Multi Measuring Units with extra Large LCD display - This new shipping postal scale has four measuring units: lb, Kg, lb/oz, oz. The extra large back-lit LCD display allows you to work under any environment.

Convenient Tare/Hold Function- Shipping postal scale features tare function which allows you to zero out the number for multi-packages purpose. Hold function allows you to lock the number after you take the package off the platform.

Power supply: USB cable, Batteries, AC adapter ( All Included). When using on Battering, it will turn off automatically after 90 seconds. When using Ac adapter for power supply, it won't turn off automatically.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars2,156 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
